title: Molly Ball on "Pelosi" &  Ron Fournier with Megan Messerly dispatches from Michigan and Nevada
description: Molly Ball, TIME Magazine National Political correspondent and author of the new book "Pelosi" joins the ToddCast. Ron Fournier calls in from Michigan and Megan Messerly checks in from Nevada with scenes of a financial collapse in the early stages.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
